name: Hippo Lodge Backpackers
description:
Hippo Lodge is a friendly and affordable hostel with an amazing, elevated view of Queenstown, from the side of Queenstown Hill, facing Lake Wakatipu and The Remarkables mountain range. Walk to town in only a few minutes and enjoy all of the region's best offerings, just be prepared for the short but steep ascent back!

We offer a mix of private rooms and mixed dorms, all of which feature views of the mountains, lake or garden. Guests have access to a fully-equipped shared kitchen and a communal lounge with TV. 

We offer free WiFi and free (but limited) parking.

T&Cs
Card details will be required for all reservations but no payment will be taken until the day of check-in. 
Any cancellation within our 1 day cancellation policy will be charged for their first nights accommodation.
All bookings made through Hostelworld, must be amended through the same channel. 
Group bookings may be required to pay a security bond on the day of check-in. Guests will be contacted directly if this is the case.

Card details will be required for all reservations but no payment will be taken until the day of check-in. 
Any cancellation within our 1 day cancellation policy will be charged for their first nights accommodation.
All bookings made through Hostelworld, must be amended through the same channel. 
Group bookings may be required to pay a security bond on the day of check-in. Guests will be contacted directly if this is the case.

*Please note that we are closed to arrivals and departures on December 31st, and January 1st.  Any bookings made on these days that violate these terms may be subject to immediate cancellation.*
